Fred Huntley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Huntley 0 Fred Huntley (29 August 1862 in London, England – 1 November 1931 in Hollywood, California) was an English silent film actor and director. Fred Huntley made his theater debut at London's Covent Garden in 1879. After years as the leading man with the Carleton Opera Company, Huntley entered the film business as a writer and director for the Selig Polyscope Company in 1912. Fred_Huntley ( 29_August_1862 in London , England – 1_November_1931 in Hollywood , California ) was an_English_silent_film_actor_and_director . Fred_Huntley made his_theater_debut at London 's_Covent_Garden in 1879 . After years as the_leading_man with the_Carleton_Opera_Company , Huntley entered the_film_business as a_writer_and_director for the_Selig_Polyscope_Company in 1912 .
